member.name: T:Sample.WPF.SampleViewModel
member.summary: Example view model used by the sample WPF application. Demonstrates property notifications and use of UndoableCollection.

member.name: M:Sample.WPF.SampleViewModel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Sample.WPF.SampleViewModel.Items
member.summary: Items collection that records changes. Uses ObservableCollection so it can be attached to UndoRedoService externally.

member.name: P:Sample.WPF.SampleViewModel.SelectedItem
member.summary: Selected item (ignored by undo tracking via attribute).

member.name: M:Sample.WPF.SampleViewModel.AddItem(System.String)
member.summary: Add a new item to the collection.

member.summary: Remove the selected item from the collection.
